com.kdotj.simplegiphy

Class SimpleGiphy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kdotj.simplegiphy.SimpleGiphy

  • public final class SimpleGiphy
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple Giphy Api Library. All responses are currently returned using Gson and Json

    NOTE: Support for XML may be needed and will only be created if requested

    Author:
    kyle.jablonski

    • Method Detail

      • setApiKey

        public static void setApiKey(java.lang.String apiKey)
        Api key setter for the Giphy API

        Call this before using the service, otherwise the dev API Key will be used. This is not recommended for use in production code.

        Parameters:
        apiKey - giphy api key

        Returns:
